Saints vs Panthers – Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets with Promo Code: WAWMETAGET CLAIM HERE

Tonight’s Marquee Match:

  • New Orleans Saints vs Carolina Panthers
  • Date: Monday, Sept. 18, 2023
  • Time: 7:15 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert Handicapper Mark Ruelle Writes:

Panthers’ QB Young will likely have another challenging week facing an even tougher defense than he did in week one against the Falcons. The Saints’ secondary is physical and will play a lot of man-to-man on the outside. The Panthers’ lack of explosive plays in week one has to be a concern as Young only threw for just over 145 yards and didn’t complete anything longer than 14 yards. The Titans presented a more experienced, physical challenge for the Saints in week one. Carr should find smoother sailing this week against the Panthers’ defense.

Prediction: New Orleans Saints -3

BetMGM Promo Code WHINERS: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

Disclaimer

 

StatSalt.com writer Paul Biagioli writes this about the Saints vs Panthers:

Both teams feature new quarterbacks, but the veteran will adapt to his new team faster than the rookie will. Bryce Young had a tough preseason opener with only 21 yards and no scoring drives, and he did not play well in the season opener with only 146 yards and more interceptions than touchdowns. On the other side of the field, Carr threw for over 300 yards and made clutch plays down the stretch to win a close game in his first game with New Orleans. The Saints’ defense was excellent on all levels and did not allow a single touchdown against the Titans. Bryce Young will have a difficult time leading drives against a team that had 3 sacks and 3 interceptions last week. New Orleans is still without Kamara, but Williams is a capable fill-in until he returns. The Saints’ young receivers, Olave and Shaheed, far outperformed any of the wideouts on Carolina. The better quarterback, offensive weapons, and defense, also line on the side of the Saints..

Prediction: New Orleans Saints -3

item.content:encoded:
Don’t miss out on the Caesars Promo Code WINNERSFULL offer HERE. This Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code will allow you to Get $250 in Bonus Bets for simply betting $50 on your initial wager.

Caesars is providing NFL fans with an opportunity to find out why they are one of the best sportsbooks in the United States! Currently, with the Caesars promo code WINNERSFULL, users are invited to join the action by grabbing up to $250 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

Get $250 in Bonus Bets Today

Claim Offer

Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

One of the best things about the Caesars Promo Code is that you will receive this offer regardless of if your first bet wins or loses. There are 16 NFL games to bet on this week, along with a huge slate of College Football and MLB games! Make sure to take advantage of the Caesars Promo Code this weekend.

Here is a NFL game you may want to use your Caesars Promo Code: WINNERSFULL Bonus Bets on today

  • Miami Dolphins vs New England Patriots
  • Date: Sunday, Sept. 17, 2023
  • Time: 7:20 pm  EST
  • Free Pick from The Tower

The home team tends to win these games (five of the last six), which is why taking the Patriots is a great play for Sunday night. Miami’s run defense is going to be porous if last week is any indication, and New England will definitely be trying to avoid another 55+ passing play day for the offense. Finding early success on the ground will avoid another hole, allowing the Patriots to run their offense freely. Even if they do trail, the Dolphins also struggle to stop passes, dating back to last season, and the Patriots pass protection was sturdy last week. Mac Jones will have time to operate and find receivers.

Miami’s offense may seem lethal, but the Patriots have had answers for them. Last year, the Dolphins scored 20 in the first meeting and 21 in the second against New England. If anyone had a game plan to neutralize Miami’s speed, it would be Patriots head coach Bill Belichick. As is, the Patriots have a strong defense. That defensive group was top-10 in yards per pass attempts last year and opened this season with another strong showing. That’ll be the key to stopping Miami since they don’t run the ball often. At worst, the Patriots will only lose this game by a few points. A win is very likely too. Take the spread because it’s safer, but don’t be afraid of the Patriots moneyline.

Prediction: New England Patriots +3

Caesars Promo Code: WINNERSFULL – Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets HERE

item.description:

The post Massachusetts Sports Betting Promo Codes for NFL Fans appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
Online sports betting is legal in Massachusetts. Use the Massachusetts sports betting promo codes this weekend.  

Massachusetts Sports Betting Promo Code: Get up to $1,500 first bet offer as a new customer if your first Bet does not win.

First Bet Offer: get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win. Claim HERE

Check out the limited-time Massachusetts sports betting promo codes.

Massachusetts legalized sports betting in August 2022, and the first retail sportsbooks opened on January 31, 2023. Online sports betting launched two months later, on March 10, 2023.

Four of the biggest names in sports betting, DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, and Caesars, are all licensed to operate in Massachusetts. These Big Four sportsbooks offer many betting options, including moneyline bets, spread bets, total bets, parlays, and prop bets.

DraftKings

  • The DraftKings first-time deposit bonus is very straightforward to understand. They offer a $150 bonus bet for any new user who bets $5 or more on any sport. The bonus bet is released instantly after the qualifying bet is placed.
  • Players with a larger bankroll also have the option to receive a 20% deposit bonus, up to $1,000 if the deposit is $5,000
  • For the potentially more prominent new member, the bonus amount is equal to 20% of that deposit amount, not to exceed $1,000 (the user must deposit $5,000 to be eligible to receive the maximum possible bonus amount of $1,000). 

    Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly! Claim HERE

FanDuel

  • From the bonus bets, the first-time deposit bonus, profit boost, free bonus bets, the reload match, and the same game parlay boost, FanDuel excels when it gives the user something to play.
  • The bonuses with FanDuel do not require much for a user to receive them, which makes them very appealing to new sports bettors and those with smaller bankrolls who are looking to get something back.

Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket HERE.

The New England Patriots are facing the Miami Dolphins, amongst several other big games in the NFL.
  • Miami Dolphins vs. New England Patriots
  • Date: Sunday, September 17, 2023
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

 

BetMGM

  • Overall, I think BetMGM’s sign-up bonus is a great offer. With that being said, it does have drawbacks: The bonus is only for those who lose their first Bet, the bonus bets are divided into five different bonus bets, and only the winnings of the bonus bet will go into your account. 
  • Although there are some drawbacks, you have to give MGM credit for offering such a generous $1,500 bonus, which exceeds what FanDuel, DraftKings, or Caesars Sportsbook are offering.

    Grab BetMGM’s First Bet Offer to get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win HERE.

Caesars Sportsbook

  • The Boosts stand out the most. They are creating 30-35 bets a day with odds that are hyped up. This gives the customers even more value (Even though these bets rarely hit). 
  • The Parlay options are also exceptional in this book, and so is the functionality. You can seamlessly move throughout the app and combine most bets.

    Caesars Sportsbook Bonus Code: WAWMETAGET – Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets  HERE

Suppose you are new to sports betting, starting with a sportsbook that offers a wide range of betting options and competitive odds. It is a good idea. It would be best to consider a sportsbook with a user-friendly app and generous promotions and bonuses.

Here is a more detailed comparison of the four sportsbooks:

DraftKings Bet $5, get $200 in bonus bets 

FanDuel Bet $5, get $200 in bonus bets + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket. 

BetMGM Bet $50, get $250 in bonus bets 

Caesars Sportsbook Bet $50, get $250 in bonus bets. 

How to Bet on Sports in Massachusetts

If you want to bet on sports in Massachusetts, you must be at least 21 years old and physically located within the state borders. You can place bets online or in person at a retail sportsbook.

To place a bet online, you must create an account with a licensed sportsbook. Once you have completed an account, you can deposit money and start betting.

Finally, to place a bet in person, you must go to a retail sportsbook and present a valid form of identification. Once the sportsbook has verified you, you can place your bet.

 

Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER (CO, DC, IL, IN, LA, MD, MS, NJ, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, WY) Call 877-8-HOPENY or text HOPENY (467369) (NY). 21+ to wager. Please Gamble Responsibly. Call 1-800-NEXT-STEP (AZ), 1-800-522-4700 (KS, NV), 1-800-327-5050 (MA), 1-800-BETS-OFF (IA), 1-800-270-7117 for confidential help (MI).

item.title: Georgia Sports Betting- Latest Legal Updates
item.dc:creator: David Delano
item.description:
Many of the Atlanta Braves, Atlanta Falcons, Atlanta Hawks, Georgia Bulldogs, and Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets are hopeful that the Georgia Sports Betting will be legalized in the near future. Although this once seemed like a long shot, sports bettors are now extremely optimistic. In the United States, sports betting was illegal in most states… Read More »Georgia Sports Betting- Latest Legal Updates

The post Georgia Sports Betting- Latest Legal Updates appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
Many of the Atlanta Braves, Atlanta Falcons, Atlanta Hawks, Georgia Bulldogs, and Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets are hopeful that the Georgia Sports Betting will be legalized in the near future. Although this once seemed like a long shot, sports bettors are now extremely optimistic.

In the United States, sports betting was illegal in most states until 2018, when the Supreme Court overturned the Professional and Amateur Sports Protection Act (PASPA). This decision paved the way for individual states to legalize sports betting, and many states have since done so.

Winners and Whiners has partnered with BetMGM to allow new bettors to obtain up to $1,500 in bonus bets. With  BetMGM Bonus Code WHINERS.

With this offer, even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $1,500. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in BetMGM Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

There are many different ways to bet on sports. Some of the most common types of bets include:

  • Moneyline bets: These bets are simply a wager on which team will win the game.
  • Point spread bets: These bets involve picking the winner of the game, but also by how many points. For example, if the point spread for a game is -3, the favorite must win by 3 points or more for the bet to be a winner.
  • Over/Under bets: These bets involve predicting the total number of points or goals scored in a game. For example, if the over/under for a game is 50 points, the bettor must predict whether the total score will be more than or less than 50 points.

Sports betting can be a fun and exciting way to add to the excitement of watching sporting events. However, it is important to remember that it is a form of gambling and there is always the risk of losing money.

BetMGM Bonus Code Promotions

BetMGM is a leading sports betting and iGaming operator in the United States. They offer a variety of promotions for new and existing customers, including:

  • $100 risk-free first bet: This promotion gives new customers a $100 free bet if their first bet loses.
  • Refer a friend bonus: BetMGM will give you and your friend $50 in bonus bets if your friend signs up using your referral code.
  • Reload bonuses: BetMGM offers reload bonuses to existing customers on a regular basis. These bonuses can give you a percentage match on your deposit, up to a certain amount.

The Status of Legalized Georgia Sports Betting

Sports betting is not yet legal in Georgia. However, there is a bill that has been introduced in the state legislature that would legalize it. The bill, HB 142, has passed the House of Representatives and is currently being considered by the Senate. If the bill is passed and signed into law, sports betting could be legalized in Georgia as early as 2024.

The Future of Georgia Sports Betting

The future of sports betting in Georgia is uncertain. However, with the passage of House Bill 142, it seems likely that sports betting will eventually be legalized.

How does the BetMGM Bonus Code work?

A lot of bettors hear about bonuses, but how does it work? How can this bonus help you as a player?

  • If you win your first wager at BetMGM, you get to keep the bet and the profit. It will then become withdrawable cash.
  • If you lose your first bet, your account will be credited with bonus bets which are equal to the amount you wagered. However, if you want to see the full $1,500 back in bonus bets, you are required to deposit and bet the max of $1,500. If you deposit and wager just $100 and it fails to win, you’ve accumulated $100 in bonus bets. If you deposit and bet $500 and it loses, you would receive $500 back in bonus bets. The same applies to any amount.

What does the BetMGM Bonus Code mean?

The BetMGM Bonus Code is entitled “WINNERS”, which gets you a $1000 first bet offer as a new customer.

You can make more by Referring a Friend with your BetMGM Code

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

item.content:encoded:
Are you ready for tonight’s Monday Night Football NFL Betting Picks for the Jets vs Bills?

Well get more ready with the Best Betting Picks Today for the Jets vs Bills with Winners and Whiners!  We also have all the Best NFL Sportsbook Betting Bonus Codes for today.

Did you know that you can bet $50 on any NFL game today and get $250 in bonus bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook promo code WAWMETAGET?

Well, you can right here!

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for the NFL season and in time to coincide with the start of the NFL season for the best betting picks.

Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets with Promo Code: WAWMETAGET CLAIM HERE

Tonight’s Marquee Match:

  • Buffalo Bills vs New York Jets
  • Date: Monday, Sept. 11, 2023
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert Handicapper Mark Ruelle Writes:

This is going to be a transitional year for the Bills. They will have a new voice in the defensive room and have committed to keeping quarterback Allen out of harm’s way. The Bills have also gone two straight seasons with a Super Bowl or Bust mentality only to fall short each season. The Jets meanwhile come into this matchup riding high with the acquisition of Rodgers and several other key pieces to an offense that held the team back in 2022.

Pick: New York Jets +2

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer
Disclaimer

 

StatSalt.com writer Paul Biagioli writes:

Even if Aaron Rodgers were not in this game, taking a home underdog in a divisional game in week 1 is the correct play. The Bills have been the same team for the past five years. They have been really good, but their offense is predictable. The Jets will have the element of surprise on the Buffalo defense, as we have not seen what this offense will look like with Rodgers at the helm. Rodgers also seems to have the ability to turn his game up when he wants to, when the Packers drafted Jordan Love, he won back-to-back league MVPs in his 30s. Rodgers will want to put on a show, and taking the points at home is the best play.

Take the Jets to cover the spread.

Pick: NY Jets +2

This is going to be a transitional year for the Bills. They will have a new voice in the defensive room and have committed to keeping quarterback Allen out of harm’s way. The Bills have also gone two straight seasons with a Super Bowl or Bust mentality only to fall short each season. The Jets meanwhile come into this matchup riding high with the acquisition of Rodgers and several other key pieces to an offense that held the team back in 2022.

item.content:encoded:
The first Sunday Night Football Game of NFL Week 1 is here!  Take advantage of this DraftKings promo code for Cowboys vs Giants game!

DraftKings is currently offering one of the promo codes in this business. By simply betting $5 today, you can get $200 in bonus bets! It may seem too good to be true, but it’s not.

Check out the link here or below:

Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly!

Claim Offer
Disclaimer

One of the best things about this promo code from DraftKings is that you will receive this offer regardless of if your first bet wins or loses. There are 16 NFL games to bet on this week, along with a huge slate of College Football and MLB games!

Make sure you check out the DraftKings Promo Code and Get $200 in Bonus Bets instantly after making a bet of at least $5! Click Here

Winners and Whiners has a team of experts who can provide guidance in Week 1! 

Check out our free NFL pick for Monday Night Football

  • Dallas Cowboys vs New York Giants
  • Date: Sunday, September 10, 2023 at 8:20 pm EDT
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert NFL Football Writer The Admiral states:

Dak Prescott has owned the Giants since he joined the league, leading his Cowboys to 11 wins in their previous 12 encounters with New York. Dallas has gone 8-3 ATS in that stretch, but I would go against the H2H betting trends in this clash.

The Cowboys have a new offensive coordinator in Brian Schottenheimer, and they might need some time to gel things. Furthermore, the Cowboys left guard Tyler Smith is questionable to play in Week 1 after suffering a hamstring injury in practice, and his eventual absence would be a massive blow to Dallas’ offense.

The Giants should be able to keep it close down the stretch. Their ground game will torture the Cowboys, who ranked 20th in the NFL in rushing yards allowed last season (129.3 per game). The Giants are 5-1 ATS in their last six games overall and 5-2 ATS in their previous seven outings at home.

Prediction: New York Giants +3.0 (-110)

 

Winners and Whiners has you covered for all the key matchups in NFL matchups this weekend. And our partner DraftKings wants to give you $200 in bonus bets to use this week!

item.description:

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code: WINNERSFULL– Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any sport! To Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets deal  ➡️ here ⬅️. Patrick Mahomes – Over… Read More »Caesars Promo Code WINNERSFULL: Bet $50, Get $250 Promo

The post Caesars Promo Code WINNERSFULL: Bet $50, Get $250 Promo appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
The NFL season is here is we have a great Caesars promo code to take advantage of for this weeks slate of games.

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code: WINNERSFULL– Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any sport!

To Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets deal  here .

Patrick Mahomes – Over 4,650.5 passing yards

Patrick Mahomes has established himself as the league’s best player and far and beyond the best quarterback. After winning the league MVP last year and leading the Kansas City Chiefs to the Super Bowl, he has put himself in a tier of his own. Mahomes has a high total he needs to pass and an injury can always derail a big year but the Over is not only a great bet but one of the best bets to make ahead of the season. Last year, he lost his top pass catcher Tyreek Hill before the season started and still had 5,250 passing yards. Assuming the offensive line stays healthy, the sky is the limit for him. 

Get $250 in Bonus Bets today at Caesars Sportsbook by betting just $50

Claim Offer

Use Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

Disclaimer

Josh Allen – Over 4,150.5 passing yards

In recent seasons, Josh Allen has made his mark as one of the best quarterbacks in the league. While there are many factors that can prevent Allen from having a big year in the air, it’s safe to assume he’ll continue to shred defenses with his arm. For starters, the run game is still in question and the Buffalo Bills will continue to lean on him to carry the offense. Additionally, the offense has shifted to his strengths in the past few seasons to not only protect him but allow him to make a difference in the passing game. On top of that, he’s thrown for over 4,200 yards in each of the past three seasons and this year should be no different.  

Jimmy Garoppolo – Under 3,300.5 passing yards

There are a lot of reasons to bet the Under on Jimmy Garoppolo’s passing totals. He’s recovering from a foot injury he suffered last season. Speaking of injuries, that’s been the story of Garoppolo’s career, especially recently. He’s only started a full season once since becoming a starter and has had the other four seasons cut short to injury. Lastly, there’s a possibility the Las Vegas Raiders finish the season with the league’s worst record as they enter the season with a depleted roster. If they start the year 1-8, it’s unlikely their starting quarterback will be as productive and even start down the stretch. 

Aaron Jones – Over 799.5 rushing yards

There’s one reason to love this prop. The Green Bay Packers after trading Aaron Rodgers in the offseason are projected to be a run-heavy team, especially with Jordan Love starting a full season for the first time in his career. With this in mind, expect Aaron Jones to get a lot of touches and possibly put together a career year. 

Joe Mixon – Under 800.5 rushing yards

Joe Mixon was a holdout before training camp started. That didn’t help his cause for a big year and considering the Bengals are a pass-happy team led by Joe Burrow and a dynamic receiving group, it would be best to avoid any Mixon rushing prop. 

 

Get $250 in Bonus Bets

Claim Offer

Use Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

Disclaimer

Najee Harris – Over 6.5 rushing touchdowns

This is one of my favorite props. The Pittsburgh Steelers are a run-heavy team and will continue to be one with Kenny Pickett in his second year under center and still picking up the offense. Najee Harris has been one of the best running backs in the league since he was drafted in 2021 and expect him to find the ball often, especially near the endzone. 

CeeDee Lamb – 1,049.5 receiving yards 

The Dallas Cowboys have tried but failed to find pass-catching help for Dak Prescott in recent years. CeeDee Lamb is the undisputed number-one receiver on the team and will be targeted as such. Look for Lamb to be targeted often by Prescott and put together his third 1,000-yard receiving season in a row. 

Amon-Ra St. Brown – Over 949.5 receiving yards

One of the best bets out there. Amon-Ra St. Brown has quietly emerged as one of the best receivers in recent years and is looking to build off a year where he had 1,161 receiving yards. The Detroit Lions are looking to take a big leap this year and expect St. Brown to be a pivotal part of this team’s success.

DeVante Adams – Under 1,200.5 receiving yards

This seems like a risky bet since DeVante Adams has made his mark as one of the league’s elite receivers. Even when everything went wrong for the Raiders last year, he proved to be unguardable with 1,516 receiving yards and 14 touchdowns. That said, the Raiders are a team that could bottom out and if things go south, Adams could be in an offense with no direction and more importantly, without a quarterback to get him the ball. 

George Kittle – Over 650.5 receiving yards

Betting the Over on a tight end is always risky. However, George Kittle is one of the exceptions as he is one of the best both as a blocker and a receiver. The biggest reason to bet on Kittle is his quarterback, Brock Purdy, who targeted him often last year. The San Francisco 49ers saw their tight end put up 293 yards in the five regular season games Purdy started and he looks to be a top target this season as well. 

Get $250 in Bonus Bets today at Caesars Sportsbook by betrAlso do not forget to check out the Best Bets from some of the Hottest Sports Handicappers in the World!

David Delano- 6-1 MLB Best Bet Run, 7-1 College Football Run and 7-2 NFL Best Bet run- To grab David’s Top plays – CLICK HERE

 

21+. Terms and conditions apply.

The post Caesars Promo Code WINNERSFULL: Bet $50, Get $250 Promo appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.

And we can’t forget about some of the key NFL Week 1 matchups:

  • Philadelphia Eagles vs New England Patriots
  • Date: Sunday, September 10
  • Time: 4:25 PM ET
  • Odds: Eagles -4 O/U 45
  • NFL Writer Dave Kovaleski writes:

There will be a lot of energy and emotion in the building as Tom Brady returns to the place where he made history. But it won’t take long for the Eagles to suck all the energy out of the building as they should dominate the Patriots. The Patriots defense should be good. It kept the team in the playoff race last year and could be even better this year. But can they hold the Eagles to the low 20s or below 20? That is doubtful. And if they don’t, they will surely lose because I just don’t see the Pats having enough firepower to get up into the mid-20s. The big issue here will be in the trenches. The Eagles pass rush should tee off on Jones and make his life miserable all afternoon. Take the Eagles giving up the points.

Prediction: Philadelphia -4

The Cowboys have a new offensive coordinator in Brian Schottenheimer, and they might need some time to gel things. Furthermore, the Cowboys left guard Tyler Smith is questionable to play in Week 1 after suffering a hamstring injury in practice, and his eventual absence would be a massive blow to Dallas’ offense.

The Giants should be able to keep it close down the stretch. Their ground game will torture the Cowboys, who ranked 20th in the NFL in rushing yards allowed last season (129.3 per game). The Giants are 5-1 ATS in their last six games overall and 5-2 ATS in their previous seven outings at home.

item.content:encoded:
You can find the Best Betting Picks for the Chiefs vs Lions this Thursday Night Football on Winners and Whiners!  We also have all the Best NFL Betting Bonus Codes for tonight and the rest of the NFL Week 1 games.

Did you know that you can bet $50 on any NFL game today and get $250 in bonus bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook promo code WAWMETAGET?

Well, you can right here!

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for the NFL season and in time to coincide with the start of the NFL season for the best betting picks.

  • Detroit Lions vs Kansas City Chiefs
  • Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert NFL Football Writer Chris King states:

“Detroit was hot in the second half of last season but it will be a challenge for the Lions to go on the road in a hostile environment like Arrowhead to earn a win. The Lions have some holes that they hope will be patched up here but the fact remains that their secondary has a lot of questions at this point. Sure, this isn’t the Chiefs team of previous years where guys like Tyreek Hill were running free but they still have Patrick Mahomes. Plus, Andy Reid knows how to get the most out of the pieces he has to work with and that should be enough to help push the Chiefs to a home win in the opener.”

Prediction: Kansas City Chiefs -4.5

BetMGM Bonus Code: Gets you a $1,500 first bet offer as a new customer.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in

Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer
Disclaimer
StatSalt.com Writer Craig Forde states: 

This is a game where I fully expect the ball to be flying from the jump. Two of the better gunslingers in the league going head-to-head to kick off the entire season and you can bet that they’ll want to put their arms on full display here. They’ll both also benefit from some thin defensive backfields to throw at. The defenses will need to be in the faces of the quarterbacks if they want to stop the pass, but both are also agile and capable of scrambling out of the pocket. The last time they met they combined to score 64 points. I expect something close to that again.

Take the over.
